name: Automated Cell Capacity Estimation
summary: perform estimations of the downlink capacity in order to serve the load management features

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.cellSubscriptionCapacity or                                     EUtranCellTDD.cellSubscriptionCapacity
parameters.description: The unit of the value must be identical to kbps instead of in                                 proportion to kbps

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.qciSubscriptionQuanta                                 (Operator Defined)
parameters.description: The unit of the value must be identical to kbps instead of in                                 proportion to kbps

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.qciSubscriptionQuanta                                 (Predefined)
parameters.description: The unit of the value must be identical to kbps instead of in                                 proportion to kbps

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.cellSubscriptionCapacity or                                     EUtranCellTDD.cellSubscriptionCapacity
parameters.description: The value affects the initial value of                                     EUtranCellFDD.dynCellSubscrCap or                                     EUtranCellTDD.dynCellSubscrCap,                                     EUtranCellFDD.cellCapMinCellSubCap or                                     EUtranCellTDD.cellCapMinCellSubCap and                                     EUtranCellFDD.cellCapMaxCellSubCap or                                     EUtranCellTDD.cellCapMaxCellSubCap

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_CELL_DL_CAPACITY
parameters.description: New estimate of cell capacity value.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_CELL_DL_CAPACITY
parameters.description: The reason for updating cell capacity value, normal update or                                     rapid compensation.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_CELL_DL_CAPACITY
events.description: New estimate of cell capacity value.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_CELL_DL_CAPACITY
events.description: The reason for updating cell capacity value, normal update or                                     rapid compensation.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011373 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011373 MO instance.
